page.title: 07FOLK LORE
page.content: SURROUNDED BY HEATHER AND BLAEBERRYS, WILD FLOWERS AND TWO SMALL ROWAN TREES (IN SCOTLAND THEY KEEP THE WITCHES AWAY) THE WATER COMES FROM UNDERGROUND. IN THE PAST TRAVELLERS LEFT SOME FOOD AT THE CHEESE WELL TO KEEP THEM SAFE ON THEIR DANGEROUS JOURNEYS ACROSS THE HILLS AND TO ENSURE THE FRIENDSHIP OF THE "WEE FOLK". WE PUT LITTLE PIECES OF THE CHEESE BY THE WELL. WE DROPPED THE FAIRY HATS THAT WE FOUND ON THE PATH ON THE WAY UP, INTO THE WATER. WE MADE OUR WISHES AT THE WELL. SHIRLEY SAW A FAIRY WITH A LEAF HAT. WE THINK THEY LIVE IN TUNNELS BEHIND THE STONES. SOME OF THE LITTLE PEOPLE CAME AND TOOK SOME OF THE FOOD THAT WE HAD LEFT FOR THEM WHEN WE WERE'NT LOOKING. WE SAID GOODBYE TO THE CHEESE WELL AND THE WEE FOLK AND WENT BACK DOWN THE HILL IN THE BRIGHT SUNSHINE.
